thread.title: CNN’s Dana Bash and John King Offer Words of Praise for Trump on SCOTUS Pick
thread.title_full: CNN’s Dana Bash and John King Offer Words of Praise for Trump on SCOTUS Pick

author: Josh Feldman
title: CNN’s Dana Bash and John King Offer Words of Praise for Trump on SCOTUS Pick

organizations.name: john king offer words of praise for trump

text:
CNN’s Dana Bash and John King Offer Words of Praise for Trump on SCOTUS Pick by Josh Feldman | 8:45   video 
CNN’s Dana Bash gave the Trump administration some credit tonight for its handling of the rollout of   Neil Gorsuch , saying “This is how it’s supposed to be done.” 
She observed that months ago pretty much everyone wondered “why on earth would conservatives… back somebody like Donald Trump and work so hard for him?” 
Well, Bash said, “This is why.” 
Conservatives have fully embraced Gorsuch and have praised Trump for making a smart decision in choosing someone in the mold of Antonin Scalia . 
John King gave Trump credit for the “unifying night” the president managed to pull off within the GOP, taking particular note of Gorsuch’s poise and sense of humor. 
Watch above, via CNN.
